articles.title: Conservative groups turn to legal pressure to rein in DEI on college campuses
articles.description: A conservative think tank is threatening Arizona State University with legal action over its diversity, equity, and inclusion programs in the latest example of conservative backlash to DEI initiatives.

articles.title: Paul Ryan Says Republicans Will Lose if They Choose Trump as Their Nominee
articles.description: “Leaders should endeavor to be honest, moral people who try to set standards for themselves and lead by example across the country,” Ryan said.
articles.content:
GOP members are slowly losing faith in their top candidate, former president Donald Trump. On September 26, Paul Ryan, a former House Speaker, joined the list of GOP members who are cautioning Republicans against making Trump the GOP nominee.

articles.title: Pope, condemning body shaming, uses personal example from boyhood
articles.description: Pope Francis on Tuesday condemned body shaming among young people, acknowledging that he was guilty of doing it himself when he was boy in Argentina more than seven decades ago.

articles.title: Black Sea Fleet: Ukraine has Russian targets in Crimea in its sights. Here's why
articles.description: The Ukrainian missile attack on the headquarters of the Russian Black Sea Fleet is perhaps the most dramatic example yet of the confidence with which Ukraine is going after Russian facilities in occupied Crimea – and the vulnerability of critically important infrastructure on the peninsula.
